## JitterStrategy enum

Jitter strategy for retry delays to prevent thundering herd. Jitter reduces simultaneous retry attempts by spreading retries out over a randomized delay interval.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare enum JitterStrategy
```

## Enumeration Members

<table><thead><tr><th>

Member

</th><th>

Value

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

FULL

</td><td>

`"FULL"`

</td><td>

Full jitter - random delay between 0 and calculated delay

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

HALF

</td><td>

`"HALF"`

</td><td>

Half jitter - random delay between 50% and 100% of calculated delay

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

NONE

</td><td>

`"NONE"`

</td><td>

No jitter - use exact calculated delay

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
